name: Wise Step
description: Referral rewards for job at Wisestep
overview:
Wisestep.com is professional community which rewards people for referring jobs on the website.

If a person refers a job placed on Wisestep to his known pals and any one gets hired by the company successfully after completing all the interview process they are entitled to get the referral money which is placed on that particular job. Anyone from any part of the world can refer a job if he finds someone suitable for that position. Professionals are provided with a points based system wherein depending on their membership with Wisestep they will paid out the referral rewards. Points can be increased by connecting and referring people onto the website. Higher the points, higher will be the membership and higher will be the referral reward paid for you.

On the other hand Recruiters are provided with FREE options like unlimited posting of jobs, Application tracking system, managing internal recruiting process, etc. Extremely useful processes which are helpful for hiring the best talent in the industry
